name: NEPacketTunnelNetworkSettings
desc: The configuration for a packet tunnel providerâ€™s virtual interface.

items.name: class NEIPv4Settings
items.desc: NEIPv4Settings contains the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) settings of a IP layer network tunnel.

items.name: class NEIPv6Settings
items.desc: NEIPv6Settings contains the Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) settings of a IP layer network tunnel.

items.name: var tunnelOverheadBytes: NSNumber?
items.desc: The number of bytes added to each tunneled packet for storing tunneling protocol headers.

items.name: var mtu: NSNumber?
items.desc: An NSNumber object containing the Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) size in bytes to assign to the TUN interface.
